arts.ttl: Bowen goal earns West Ham point against much-changed Spurs
arts.sum: Potter wanted a response from his players in this London derby, but they made the worst possible start, as a key error from Kilman gifted Spurs a goal despite the visitors barely threatening in the opening minutes. Spurs took the lead in the 15th minute with their first foray into the Hammers box as Kilman failed to deal with a ball forward which allowed Mathys Tel to set up Odobert who finished with ease.

arts.ttl: Jarrod Bowen salvages point for West Ham against much-changed Tottenham
arts.sum: Wilson Odobert had opened the scoring with his first goal for Spurs.
